chart_metadata.name: tiny-media-manager
chart_metadata.description: tinyMediaManager is a media management tool written in Java/Swing.

capabilities.name: CHOWN
capabilities.description: tinyMediaManager is able to chown files.

capabilities.name: SETGID
capabilities.description: tinyMediaManager is able to set group ID for it's sub-processes.

capabilities.name: SETUID
capabilities.description: tinyMediaManager is able to set user ID for it's sub-processes.

groups.name: User and Group Configuration
groups.description: Configure User and Group for tinyMediaManager

attrs.label: Password (Optional)
attrs.description: The password for tinyMediaManager.

attrs.label: Additional Environment Variables
attrs.description: Configure additional environment variables for tinyMediaManager.

attrs.label: User ID
attrs.description: The user id that tinyMediaManager files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Group ID
attrs.description: The group id that tinyMediaManager files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Web Port
attrs.description: The port for the tinyMediaManager Web UI.

attrs.label: tinyMediaManager Data Storage
attrs.description: The path to store tinyMediaManager Data.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

attrs.description: The configuration for the ixVolume dataset.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.</br>
SMB Share: Is a SMB share that is mounted to a persistent volume claim.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)
SMB Share (Mounts a persistent volume claim to a SMB share)

attrs.label: Size (in Gi)
attrs.description: The size of the volume quota.

attrs.label: CPU
attrs.description: CPU limit for tinyMediaManager.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid CPU limit formats are</br>
- Plain Integer - eg. 1</br>
- Float - eg. 0.5</br>
- Milicpu - eg. 500m

attrs.label: Memory
attrs.description: Memory limit for tinyMediaManager.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid Memory limit formats are</br>
- Suffixed with E/P/T/G/M/K - eg. 1G</br>
- Suffixed with Ei/Pi/Ti/Gi/Mi/Ki - eg. 1Gi</br>
- Plain Integer in bytes - eg. 1024</br>
- Exponent - eg. 134e6
